verses.name: Acts 10:12
verses.text: Wherein were all manner of fourfooted beasts of the earth, and wild beasts, and creeping things, and fowls of the air.

verses.name: Acts 10:13
verses.text: And there came a voice to him, Rise, Peter; kill, and eat.

verses.name: Acts 10:14
verses.text: But Peter said, Not so, Lord; for I have never eaten any thing that is common or unclean.

verses.name: Acts 10:15
verses.text: And the voice spake unto him again the second time, What God hath cleansed, that call not thou common.

verses.name: Acts 10:16
verses.text: This was done thrice: and the vessel was received up again into heaven.
